summary: *Teletubbies* is a popular kids' TV show from the UK. It's about four colorful characters with TV screens on their tummies. They talk in funny sounds and look like little kids. The show won lots of awards and was a big hit worldwide. People loved it so much that they bought lots of *Teletubbies* toys and games. The show first aired in the 1990s but came back with new episodes in 2014. You can watch all the old episodes on the Noggin app in the U.S.
title: Teletubbies
